alert.note: Alert for Grand (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 10 at 8:13PM MDT until June 12 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Colorado... Colorado River above Grand Lake affecting Grand County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Colorado River above Grand Lake. * WHEN...Until early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 7.6 feet, Water begins to impact low lying areas along the river. At 7.7 feet, Approaches to foot bridges and trails along and crossing the river are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM MDT Saturday, June 10 the stage was 7.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate below flood stage with a maximum value of 7.8 feet early Monday morning. - Action stage is 7.6 feet. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
